Reading List (my common references) 13 Apr 2015

This post is list of articles, blogs and other resources that I commonly reference.

Books

  • Rocket Surgery Made Easy - Usability testing
  • The Bogleheads' Guide to Investing - Saving for retirement
  • Leadership and Self-Deception - Management
  • Managing Humans - Management
  • Getting Things Done - Organization
  • Code Complete - Coding
  • The Mythical Man-Month - Project management
  • Agile Software Development with Scrum - Agile
  • The Coaching Habit - Management

Articles

  • Three Snakes
  • The Twelve Factor App - Tenets for building microservices
  • Give it Five Minutes - Knee jerk idea dismissal
  • The Hiring Post - Software engineer interviews suck
  • SQLAlchemy for Django Devs
  • 15 Fundamental Laws of Software Development
  • The Scrum Guide
  • IT'S NOT A PROMOTION - IT'S A CAREER CHANGE

I'm currently working at NerdWallet, a startup in San Francisco trying to bring clarity to all of life's financial decisions. We're hiring like crazy. Hit me up on Twitter, I would love to talk.
